metadata.title: CVE-2017-17818 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is a heap-based buffer over-readthat will cause a remote denial of service attack, related to a while loopin paste_tokens in asm/preproc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.13.02-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.13.02-0.1').
